metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3561 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An Out of Bounds flaw was found fig2dev version 3.2.8a. A flawed bounds check in read_objects() could allow an attacker to provide a crafted malicious input causing the application to either crash or in some cases cause memory corruption. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to integrity as well as system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.8-3
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> shipped fig2dev into transfig for xenial and trusty has not the code affected

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.8-3').
